case_circumstances: Body Found by Road Commission Employee about 20' from roadway on I-696, east of Haggerty road, Farmington Hills.  Body has scar or birthmark on the upper right hip. Fingernails painted Pink and Purple.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_clothing_on_body: Pink bra, Multicolor cloth belts, white t-shirt, A unique pair of underwear depicting two young children on the front with the words “Sharing is beautiful” was found on the female
case_other_items_with_body: A bus ticket dated June 6, 1975 from Jefferson Lines bus service was found near the female but it is unknown if the ticket is associated with this female or not.
dental: Dental information / charting is currently not available
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
